lines.text: She makes me want to stick a knife in my head.
Why do I have to turn 33?
Why would you want to help me? I just raped you.
Why can't you look like a supermodel?
You look so different from your pictures in the magazines.
It's called airbrushing; it's designed to make you look happy.
Gloria, I want you back here tonight by six o'clock. I don't want any of these all-night things going on while your cousin is here. We don't want her thinking you're a slut.
But I am a slut, mother.
You make me feel like...like I'm in the third grade again, you know? Like, like when everything I ever wanted seemed possible.
